tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sensor_readings (
  reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  reading_value FLOAT,
  reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
CREATE TABLE sensor_data (sensor_id INT, sensor_reading FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE alerts (alert_id INT, sensor_id INT, threshold FLOAT, message TEXT, alerted_at TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE sensors (sensor_id INT, sensor_name TEXT, location TEXT)

CREATE TABLE triggers (
  trigger_id INT NOT NULL,
  sensor_id INT NOT NULL,
  min_threshold FLOAT NOT NULL,
  max_threshold FLOAT NOT NULL,
  alert_message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (trigger_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensor_readings(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
  alert_id INT NOT NULL,
  trigger_id INT NOT NULL,
  alert_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  alert_message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (alert_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trigger_id) REFERENCES triggers(trigger_id)
);
